column1: Ahmad placed the set up in his garden. He noticed that small birds have been feeding on the seeds at P. However
column2: no photographs of the small birds were taken by the camera although it was working properly. Describe one change that Ahmad can make to the set-up so the camera will take photographs of the small birds as well.

column1: He can use a shorter spring.
Ahmad can use a shorter spring.
He can use a softer spring.
Ahmad can use a softer spring.
